definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

da4 nan2 zi3 zhu3 yi4 zhe3

sentences.english: Both men had direct contact with dead chickens when feeding carcasses to their dogs.

sentences.english: Through the trial, was initially arrested the two men and Lim Yang.
sentences.chinese: 通过审讯，最初被抓获的两男子为任某和杨某。

sentences.english: A man from China died after his three day gaming binge.
sentences.chinese: 一名中国男子在三天三夜的游戏狂欢之后，死掉了。

sentences.english: Eventually, a man drove us in his own car to safety.
sentences.chinese: 最后，一名男子开车把我们载到安全之地。

sentences.english: My father was the presiding judge in a case involving a man charged with tax evasion.

sentences.english: Early today, the body of a 25-year-old man was found in West Town.

sentences.english: The missing sailors are two men aged 30 and 52.

sentences.english: In the men's team final, Hungary team to play extremely well.
sentences.chinese: 在男子团体决赛中，匈牙利队的发挥非常出色。

sentences.english: A man ran up to President Garfield, pulled out a gun, and fired twice.

sentences.english: I was 26 by then -- which is ancient for a male gymnast.
sentences.chinese: 我那时26岁，作为一名男子体操运动员已经太老了。

sentences.english: And with that he finishes the man's drink in one gulp .
sentences.chinese: 他话一说完，就把男子的酒一饮而尽。

sentences.english: Investigators have identified the bomber as Han Wushun.
